00023 Weapon::Weapon(PlayManager* playManager) : ParticlesEmiter(playManager->parallelscene.particles)
00024 {
00025     m_playManager = playManager;
00026     m_worldSettings = m_playManager->manager.app->globalSettings.world;
00027     m_soundManager = m_playManager->manager.sound;
00028 
00029     m_shooter = NULL;
00030 
00031     m_maxAmmoDammage = 0;
00032     m_maxAmmoCount = 0;
00033 
00034     m_shootSize = 1;
00035 
00036     m_ammoCount = 0;
00037 
00038     m_shootSpeed = 0;
00039     m_shootCadency = 0;
00040 
00041     m_mapAABB = m_playManager->map.aabb;
00042

00044 
00045     m_name = "Weapon";
00046 }

00070 Weapon::~Weapon()
00071 {
00072     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_bulletArray.size(); i++)
00073         delete m_bulletArray[i];
00074 }
00075 
00076 void Weapon::Process()
00077 {
00078     unsigned requsetSize = m_ammoCount * m_shootSize + m_bulletArray.size();
00079 
00080     if(requsetSize > m_number)
00081     {
00082         SetNumber(requsetSize);
00083         Build();
00084     }
00085 
00086     Particle* particles = BeginParticlesPosProcess();
00087 
00088     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_bulletArray.size(); i++)
00089     {
00090         if(m_bulletArray[i]->IsDeadAmmo())
00091         {
00092             delete m_bulletArray[i], m_bulletArray[i] = NULL;
00093         }
00094 
00095         else
00096         {
00097             m_bulletArray[i]->Process();
00098             particles[i].pos = m_bulletArray[i]->GetPos();
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00102     EndParticlesPosProcess();
00103 
00104     Bullet::Array::iterator newend = remove(m_bulletArray.begin(), m_bulletArray.end(), (Bullet*)NULL);
00105     m_bulletArray.erase(newend, m_bulletArray.end());
00106 
00107     SetDrawNumber(m_bulletArray.size());
00108 }

00113     m_soundID = path.stem();
00114 
00115     m_soundManager->RegisterSound(m_soundID, fireSound);

00148 bool Weapon::Shoot(Vector3f startpos, Vector3f targetpos)
00149 {
00150     // Controle des munitions
00151     if(m_ammoCount <= 0)
00152     {
00153         if(m_shooter->clocks.shoot.IsEsplanedTime(1000))
00154             m_soundManager->Play("noAvailable", m_shooter);
00155 
00156         return false;
00157     }
00158 
00159     // Controle de la cadence de tire
00160     long shootCadency = m_playManager->GetBullettime()->IsActive() ? m_shootCadency * 4 : m_shootCadency;
00161 
00162     if(!m_shootCadencyClock.IsEsplanedTime(shootCadency))
00163         return false;
00164 
00165     if(m_bulletArray.size() > m_maxAmmoCount)
00166         return false;
00167 
00168     m_soundManager->Play(m_soundID, m_shooter);
00169 
00170     m_ammoCount--;
00171 
00172     ProcessShoot(startpos, targetpos);
00173 
00174     return true;
00175 }

00187 bool Weapon::UpAmmoCount(int ammoCount)
00188 {
00189     if(m_ammoCount >= m_maxAmmoCount)
00190         return false;
00191 
00192     if(m_ammoCount + ammoCount > m_maxAmmoCount)
00193         m_ammoCount = m_maxAmmoCount;
00194 
00195     else
00196         m_ammoCount += ammoCount;
00197 
00198     return true;
00199 }
00200 
00201 void Weapon::SetAmmoCount(unsigned ammoCount)
00202 {
00203 
00204     if(ammoCount > m_maxAmmoCount)
00205         ammoCount = m_maxAmmoCount;
00206 
00207     this->m_ammoCount = ammoCount;
00208 }

00281     SetShootSpeed(64);
00282     SetFireSound(SOUND_BLASTER);
00283 
00284     SetTexture(WEAPON_BLASTER);
00285     SetNumber(200);

00292 
00293 void WeaponBlaster::ProcessShoot(tbe::Vector3f startpos, tbe::Vector3f targetpos)
00294 {
00295     startpos += tools::rand(Vector3f(-m_worldSettings.playerSize * 0.5),
00296                             Vector3f(m_worldSettings.playerSize * 0.5));
00297 
00298     // Creation du tire
00299     Bullet* fire = new Bullet(m_playManager);
00300     fire->SetWeapon(this);
00301     fire->SetDammage(tools::rand(1, m_maxAmmoDammage));
00302     fire->Shoot(startpos, targetpos, m_shootSpeed);
00303 
00304     m_bulletArray.push_back(fire);
00305 }

00328 void WeaponShotgun::ProcessShoot(tbe::Vector3f startpos, tbe::Vector3f targetpos)
00329 {
00330     for(int i = 0; i < 7; i++)
00331     {
00332         // Creation du tire
00333         Bullet * fire = new Bullet(m_playManager);
00334         fire->SetWeapon(this);
00335         fire->SetDammage(tools::rand(1, m_maxAmmoDammage));
00336         fire->Shoot(startpos, targetpos, m_shootSpeed, 0.1);
00337 
00338         m_bulletArray.push_back(fire);
00339     }
00340 }

00362 
00363 void WeaponBomb::ProcessShoot(tbe::Vector3f startpos, tbe::Vector3f targetpos)
00364 {
00365     Vector3f relrot(0, 0, 0.25);
00366 
00367     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_shootSize; i++)
00368     {
00369         relrot.Rotate(45 * i, 0);
00370 
00371         Bullet * fire = new Bullet(m_playManager);
00372         fire->SetWeapon(this);
00373         fire->SetDammage(100);
00374         fire->Shoot(startpos + relrot, startpos + (relrot * 4.0f), m_shootSpeed);
00375 
00376         m_bulletArray.push_back(fire);
00377     }
00378 }

00382 WeaponFinder::WeaponFinder(PlayManager* playManager) : Weapon(playManager)

00385     SetAmmoCount(180);
00386     SetMaxAmmoDammage(50);

00391     SetTexture(WEAPON_FINDER);

00399 
00400 void WeaponFinder::Process()
00401 {
00402     Particle* particles = BeginParticlesPosProcess();
00403 
00404     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_bulletArray.size(); i++)
00405     {
00406         if(m_bulletArray[i]->IsDeadAmmo())
00407         {
00408             delete m_bulletArray[i], m_bulletArray[i] = NULL;
00409         }
00410 
00411         else
00412         {
00413             m_bulletArray[i]->Process();
00414             particles[i].pos = m_bulletArray[i]->GetPos();
00415 
00416             bool targetLocked = false;
00417 
00418             Vector3f minDist = m_mapAABB.max - m_mapAABB.min;
00419 
00420             const Player::Array& targets = m_playManager->GetTargetsOf(m_shooter);
00421 
00422             for(unsigned j = 0; j < targets.size(); j++)
00423             {
00424                 Vector3f ammodiri = m_bulletArray[i]->GetVelocity().Normalize();
00425                 Vector3f targetdiri = (targets[j]->GetPos() - m_bulletArray[i]->GetPos()).Normalize();
00426 
00427                 if(Vector3f::Dot(targetdiri, ammodiri) > 0.5f)
00428                 {
00429                     minDist = min(targets[j]->GetPos() - m_bulletArray[i]->GetPos(), minDist);
00430                     targetLocked = true;
00431                 }
00432             }
00433 
00434             if(targetLocked)
00435             {
00436                 m_bulletArray[i]->SetApplyForce(minDist.Normalize() * m_shootSpeed / 2.0f);
00437             }
00438         }
00439     }
00440 
00441     EndParticlesPosProcess();
00442 
00443     Bullet::Array::iterator newend = remove(m_bulletArray.begin(), m_bulletArray.end(), (Bullet*)NULL);
00444     m_bulletArray.erase(newend, m_bulletArray.end());
00445 
00446     SetDrawNumber(m_bulletArray.size());
00447 }
00448 
00449 void WeaponFinder::ProcessShoot(tbe::Vector3f startpos, tbe::Vector3f targetpos)
00450 {
00451     // Creation du tire
00452     Bullet * fire = new Bullet(m_playManager);
00453     fire->SetWeapon(this);
00454     fire->SetDammage(tools::rand(1, m_maxAmmoDammage));
00455     fire->Shoot(startpos, targetpos, m_shootSpeed);
00456 
00457     m_bulletArray.push_back(fire);
00458 }

00540 bool Bullet::IsDeadAmmo()
00541 {
00542     return (m_life <= 0 || !m_playManager->map.aabb.IsInner(m_matrix.GetPos()));
00543 }
00544 
00545 void Bullet::Shoot(tbe::Vector3f startpos, tbe::Vector3f targetpos, float shootspeed, float accuracy)
00546 {
00547     m_startPos = startpos;
00548     m_targetPos = targetpos;
00549     m_shootDiri = (targetpos - startpos).Normalize();
00550     m_shootSpeed = shootspeed;
00551 
00552     m_shootDiri += tools::rand(AABB(-accuracy, accuracy));
00553 
00554     m_matrix.SetPos(startpos);
00555 
00556     SetUpdatedMatrix(&m_matrix);
00557 
00558     Settings::World& worldSettings = m_playManager->manager.app->globalSettings.world;
00559 
00560     BuildSphereNode(worldSettings.weaponSize, worldSettings.weaponMasse);
00561     NewtonBodySetContinuousCollisionMode(m_body, true);
00562 
00563     m_applyGravity = false;
00564 
00565     m_playManager->manager.material->AddBullet(this);
00566 
00567     NewtonBodyAddImpulse(m_body, m_shootDiri * m_shootSpeed, m_startPos);
00568 }
